step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands in your lap. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in future repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands toward your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you move your hands up.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
You held the stretch well. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward to maximize the benefit.
You successfully reversed the motion. Ensure your wrists stay relatively straight as you return to the starting position.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your head up and avoid pulling forward. Focus on keeping your wrists straighter as you move your hands.
